statements: SELECT * FROM work_in_progress_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT production_id, worker_id FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE production_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT product_name, work_station FROM work_in_progress_inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE worker_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT * FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT production_id, product_name, quantity FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE worker_id = 101 AND start_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT production_id, product_name, work_station, start_time, end_time FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, worker_id, start_time, end_time FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND work_station = 'Assembly' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE worker_id = 201 AND end_time < '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM work_in_progress_inventory;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM work_in_progress_inventory ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM work_in_progress_inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM production_flow WHERE worker_name LIKE 'Jenny%';
SELECT id, step_name, start_time, end_time FROM production_flow ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM work_in_progress_inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity, DATE(production_date) AS date_only FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE STATUS = 'In Progress' ORDER BY date_only DESC;
SELECT worker_name, COUNT(*) AS total_steps FROM production_flow GROUP BY worker_name ORDER BY total_steps DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, production_date, quantity, status FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM work_in_progress_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE in_production = TRUE;
SELECT id, product_name, location, quantity FROM work_in_progress_inventory ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_flow_monitor WHERE status = 'in progress';
SELECT product_name, production_stage, last_updated FROM production_flow_monitor ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM work_in_progress_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, product_name, location FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE in_production = TRUE
SELECT product_name, quantity, location, in_production FROM work_in_progress_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND location LIKE 'Warehouse%'
SELECT * FROM production_flow_monitor WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name, production_stage, status FROM production_flow_monitor WHERE production_stage = 2
SELECT * FROM Workstations;
SELECT workstation_name, workstation_location FROM Workstations;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT line_name, line_leader, workstation_name FROM AssemblyLine JOIN Workstations ON AssemblyLine.workstation_id = Workstations.workstation_id;
SELECT * FROM Workstations
SELECT workstation_name, workstation_location FROM Workstations WHERE workstation_id = 1
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT line_name, line_leader, workstation_name FROM AssemblyLine INNER JOIN Workstations ON AssemblyLine.workstation_id = Workstations.workstation_id
SELECT * FROM work_orders WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 100.00;
SELECT line_id, line_name, supervisor_id FROM production_lines ORDER BY supervisor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_available < 20 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT log_id, line_id, order_id, start_time, end_time FROM production_logs WHERE line_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM work_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100.00;
SELECT line_name, supervisor_id FROM production_lines ORDER BY line_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_available < 10 AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM work_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01');
SELECT log_id, order_id, start_time, end_time FROM production_logs WHERE line_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
